|default_pass= |oui=00:03:93,00:0A:95,00:11:24,00:16:CB,00:19:E3 |oui_eth=00:03:93,00:0D:93,00:11:24,00:14:51 }} {{TagLine|AirPort Extreme Base Station with Modem}} :Model: A1034, P/N: M8799LL/A The default SSID is '''Apple Network XXXXXX''' where '''XXXXXX''' is the last :three octets of the wireless interface MAC address (lower case letters). {{WPLink|AirPort}} ===Links=== *[https://ifixit.com/Guide/Apple+AirPort+Extreme+Model+A1034+Motherboard+Replacement/6750 ''Apple AirPort Extreme Model A1034'' Teardown on '''iFixit'''] *[https://ifixit.com/Teardown/Apple+AirPort+Extreme+Model+A1143+Teardown/438 ''Apple AirPort Extreme Model A1143'' Teardown on '''iFixit'''] ===Models=== *[[Apple AirPort Extreme Base Station A1034 (M8799LL/A)]] • [https://madeapple.com/airport-extreme-base-station-with-modem/ Spec.] :2x FE ports, 1x USB 2.0 port, external antenna connector, 1x modem port (56k V.90) *[[Apple AirPort Extreme Base Station A1034 (M8930LL/A)]] • [https://madeapple.com/airport-extreme-base-station/ Spec.] :2x FE ports, 1x USB 2.0 port, external antenna connector *[[Apple AirPort Extreme Base Station A1034 (M9397LL/A)]] • :2x FE ports, 1x USB 2.0 port, external antenna connector, PoE cable (UL2043) *[[Apple AirPort Extreme Card A1026 (M8881LL/A)]] • [https://madeapple.com/airport-extreme-card/ Spec.]
